page.title: 15BOYS AND GIRLS CLOTHING
page.content:
I am an eight year old boy. I have many different clothes for different occasions. In winter I wear warm woolly clothes such as trousers and jumpers. In summer I wear shorts and a T shirt. When I go swimming I wear trunks which are like shorts. At bed time I wear pyjamas. I am an eight year old girl. When I go to parties I wear my party dress and my red shoes. In the garden I wear my T shirt and my skirt and my green trainers. Trainers are like exercise shoes. At night I wear a nightie but I also have pyjamas. For swimming I wear a costume or bikini.
TRAFALGAR SCHOOL
